WPS Chart:

21
Alastir
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017, 6:33:36 PM

How does this work? * At the blacksmith, you can add SP. (Up to 25 at Duskruin). * Look at the chart and find where 25 SP would be. (Between 20-30) * Since 25 is between 20-30, you're stuck at the bonus offered at 20. * Look to the left of the 20 SP row, it will have the number of PP you'll get. (2) * Look to the right of the PP column, and you'll see that at 20 SP or 2 PP, you'll have "Lightly" WPS weapon/armor.

If you already have a WPS weapon or armor. * Find the name of your padding level (heavily) and look to the right. * You'll see that HCP is either 9 or 10 PP. * Look to the right again, and you'll see that 9 or 10 PP is either 130 or 150 SP. * You'll be able to add 25 SP using the blacksmith.

  • WPS -> Weighting/Padding/Sighting
  • PP -> Padding Points
  • SP -> Service Points

|Name|PP|SP| |:---:|:---:|:---:| Lightly | 1 | 10 Lightly | 2 | 20 Fairly | 3 | 30 Fairly| 4 | 40 Somewhat | 5 | 50 Somewhat | 6 | 70 Decently | 7 | 90 Decently | 8 | 110 Heavily | 9 | 130 Heavily | 10 | 150 Very Heavily | 11 | 180 Very Heavily | 12 | 210 Very Heavily | 13 | 240 Exceptionally | 14 | 270 Exceptionally | 15 | 300 Masterfully | 16 | 340 Masterfully | 17 | 380 Masterfully | 18 | 420 Masterfully | 19 | 460 Masterfully | 20 | 500 Superbly | 25 | | 1000 Expertly | 30 | | 1500 Phenomenally | 35 | | 2000 Fantastically | 40 | | 2500 Incredibly | 45 | | 3500 Wondrously | 50 | | 5000

Ordim
Tuesday, August 29th, 2017, 8:21:23 PM

1 item inside the smithy per invite - 25 services on a single item this run of duskruin. so even if you only use 10 services on an item, thats your 1 invite. You can use all 25 on a single item, but even with a second invite you cant do any more.
